tool_description: Calculates total credit hours earned, GPA, and credit distribution across different course categories for degree planning.

course_credits.description: Array of credit hours for each completed course

course_grades.description: Array of letter grades for each completed course

include_transfer.description: Whether to include transfer credits in calculations

error_messages: Array length mismatch: completed_courses, course_credits, and course_grades must have the same length.
Invalid credit value: Credit hours must be positive numbers, typically between 0.5 and 6.0.
Invalid grade: Grades must be valid letter grades (A, B, C, D, F with optional +/-) or P/NP.
Invalid grade scale: Grade scale must be one of ['4.0', '4.33', '5.0'].
Insufficient data: At least one completed course is required for calculations.
usage: Provide arrays of completed courses, their credit hours, and grades. Optionally specify grade scale and whether to include transfer credits.

total_credits_attempted.description: Total credit hours attempted (including failed courses)

credit_distribution.description: Breakdown of credits by category (core, elective, major, etc.)
